languages.text: "Мы веруем... в Многорукого Императора, что ждет... чад своих, брошенных в бездну незнаемую. Он добр... милостив... он повергает тиранию злых людей... шлет ангела своего праведным, и ангелов меньших..." {n}Мужчина удивленно опускает глаза. Кажется, он выложил вам всю свою небогатую религию.{/n}

"We believe... in the Many-Armed Emperor... He who waits... for His children, cast out into the unknowable abyss. He is kind... merciful... He uproots tyrannies of evil... He sends His angel to the righteous, and angel's kin follow..." {n}The man lowers his gaze with an expression of surprise. It seems he has described his paltry religion in its entirety.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы веруем... в Многорукого Императора, что ждет... чад своих, брошенных в бездну незнаемую. Он добр... милостив... он повергает тиранию злых людей... шлет ангела своего праведным, и ангелов меньших..." {n}Мужчина удивленно опускает глаза. Кажется, он выложил вам всю свою небогатую религию.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "We believe... in the Emperor-in-the-Void... He who waits... for His children, cast out into the unknowable abyss. He is kind... merciful... He uproots tyrannies of evil... He sends His angel to the righteous, and younger angels follow..." {n}The man lowers his gaze with an expression of surprise. It seems he has described his paltry religion in its entirety.{/n}

languages.text: «Creemos... en el Emperador de Múltiples Brazos... Espera... a Sus hijos, abandonados en el abismo incognoscible. Es bondadoso... misericordioso... Arranca de raíz las tiranías del mal... Envía a Su ángel a los justos, y los allegados del ángel lo siguen...». {n}El hombre baja la mirada con expresión sorprendida. Parece que ha descrito su patética religión al completo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We believe... in the Many-Armed Emperor... He who waits... for His children, cast out into the unknowable abyss. He is kind... merciful... He uproots tyrannies of evil... He sends His angel to the righteous, and angel's kin follow..." {n}The man lowers his gaze with an expression of surprise. It seems he has described his paltry religion in its entirety.{/n}

Arranca de raíz las tiranías del mal... Envía a Su ángel a los justos, y los allegados del ángel lo siguen...». {n}El hombre baja la mirada con expresión sorprendida. Parece que ha descrito su patética religión al completo.{/n}

languages.text: 「我々は、信じている…千手皇帝を…あの方こそ…知られざる深淵に、投げ出された子らを…待っておられる。あの方は親切で…慈悲深く... 悪の暴虐を根絶する…正しい者に天使を遣わせて、天使の親族はそれに従う…」{n}男は驚いた顔つきで視線を落とす。どうやら自分のくだらない宗教を、そのまま説明しているようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We believe... in the Many-Armed Emperor... He who waits... for His children, cast out into the unknowable abyss. He is kind... merciful... He uproots tyrannies of evil... He sends His angel to the righteous, and angel's kin follow..." {n}The man lowers his gaze with an expression of surprise. It seems he has described his paltry religion in its entirety.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「我々は、信じている…ヴォイドの皇帝を…あの方こそ…知られざる深淵に、投げ出された子らを…待っておられる。あの方は親切で…慈悲深く... 悪の暴虐を根絶する…正しい者に天使を遣わせて、天使の親族はそれに従う…」{n}男は驚いた顔つきで視線を落とす。どうやら自分のくだらない宗教を、そのまま説明しているようだ。{/n}

languages.text: “我们信仰……四臂神皇……祂在等待……祂的儿女……遗落在不为人知的深渊之中。祂是善良……仁慈……的化身……铲除邪恶的暴政……祂派遣祂的天使前往义人身边……天使的眷族也会随之而来……”{n}男人带着惊讶的表情垂下了头，看来他那可怜的信仰只有这一丁点内容。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We believe... in the Many-Armed Emperor... He who waits... for His children, cast out into the unknowable abyss. He is kind... merciful... He uproots tyrannies of evil... He sends His angel to the righteous, and angel's kin follow..." {n}The man lowers his gaze with an expression of surprise. It seems he has described his paltry religion in its entirety.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们信仰……四臂神皇……祂在等待……祂的儿女……遗落在不为人知的深渊之中。祂是善良……仁慈……的化身……铲除邪恶的暴政……祂派遣祂的天使前往义人身边……天使的眷族也会随之而来……”{n}男人带着惊讶的表情垂下了头，看来他那可怜的信仰只有这一丁点内容。{/n}

languages.text: "Wir glauben ... an den vielarmigen Imperator ... An ihn, der auf seine Kinder wartet, die in den unergründlichen Abyss geworfen wurden. Er ist gütig ... gnädig ... Er entwurzelt Tyranneien des Bösen ... Er schickt Seine Engel zu den Rechtschaffenen, und die Sippe der Engel folgt ..." {n}Der Mann senkt mit überraschter Miene den Blick. Er hat seine erbärmliche Religion offenbar bereits in ihrer Gesamtheit beschrieben.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We believe... in the Many-Armed Emperor... He who waits... for His children, cast out into the unknowable abyss. He is kind... merciful... He uproots tyrannies of evil... He sends His angel to the righteous, and angel's kin follow..." {n}The man lowers his gaze with an expression of surprise. It seems he has described his paltry religion in its entirety.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir glauben ... an den vielarmigen Imperator ... An ihn, der auf seine Kinder wartet, die in den unergründlichen Abyss geworfen wurden. Er ist gütig ... gnädig ... Er entwurzelt Tyranneien des Bösen ... Er schickt Seine Engel zu den Rechtschaffenen, und die Sippe der Engel folgt ..." {n}Der Mann senkt mit überraschter Miene den Blick. Er hat seine erbärmliche Religion offenbar bereits in ihrer Gesamtheit beschrieben.{/n}

languages.text: « Nous croyons... en l'Empereur aux mille bras... Lui qui attend... Ses enfants bannis dans les abysses insondables. Il est bon et... miséricordieux... Il éradique la tyrannie du mal jusqu'à la racine... et envoie Son bras droit auprès des justes, suivi de près par ses auxiliaires angéliques... » {n}L'homme baisse les yeux d'un air surpris. Apparemment, toute la teneur de sa pitoyable religion tient en ces quelques phrases sans queue ni tête.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We believe... in the Many-Armed Emperor... He who waits... for His children, cast out into the unknowable abyss. He is kind... merciful... He uproots tyrannies of evil... He sends His angel to the righteous, and angel's kin follow..." {n}The man lowers his gaze with an expression of surprise. It seems he has described his paltry religion in its entirety.{/n}

Il éradique la tyrannie du mal jusqu'à la racine... et envoie Son bras droit auprès des justes, suivi de près par ses auxiliaires angéliques... » {n}L'homme baisse les yeux d'un air surpris. Apparemment, toute la teneur de sa pitoyable religion tient en ces quelques phrases sans queue ni tête.{/n}

languages.text: "Biz... Çok Kollu Tanrı'ya inanırız. O ki bilinmez uçurumlara atılan... Çocuklarını bekler. O ki... Merhametlidir... Habis tiranların kökünü kazır. Erdemlilere meleğini gönderir, meleğinin soydaşı da itaat eder..." {n}Adam, yüzünde şaşkın bir ifadeyle bakışlarını indiriyor. Görünüşe göre rezil dinini tüm ayrıntılarıyla tasvir etti.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We believe... in the Many-Armed Emperor... He who waits... for His children, cast out into the unknowable abyss. He is kind... merciful... He uproots tyrannies of evil... He sends His angel to the righteous, and angel's kin follow..." {n}The man lowers his gaze with an expression of surprise. It seems he has described his paltry religion in its entirety.{/n}
